name: Enemies Defender
description:
Attention, attention! Enemies are approaching.

Welcome in this indie-defense game! Welcome to a beautiful story where you have your own castle. Someone wants us bad... Arm your archers with the best arrows to be able to face the enemies and not allow them to approach the gates of the castle to destroy it.

Call for help the magicians who will attack from a distance, this way you will save time to think of a new defense method. Demonstrate your leadership skills in these difficult moments and don't let the castle's creatures fall into panic. Start aiming from now and don't leave until the last hundred meters!
Game features :
- 30 levels
- 3 magic abilities (Ice Magic, Lighting, Skill Book)
- The ability to call more archers
